title: Information Security Discovery & Assessment
content: INT's InfoSec discovery service evaluates your current security posture and identifies vulnerabilities. We conduct interviews and analyses to produce a remediation blueprint, helping you prepare for SOC 2, ISO 27001, or other compliance frameworks.

title: SOC 2 Compliance Implementation
content: We help implement policies and procedures required for SOC 2 compliance, including password policies, data retention, off-boarding processes. INT achieved SOC 2 for our own organization.

title: Cyber Insurance Support
content: INT assists with cyber-insurance questionnaires by gathering accurate information and crafting precise responses to secure coverage.

title: Managed InfoSec Services
content: Ongoing managed InfoSec services include vulnerability scans, tabletop exercises, threat detection, incident response, and continuous monitoring.

title: Managed IT & 24/7 Support
content: 24/7 helpdesk support, network security, hardware/software maintenance, proactive monitoring, and compliance assistance.

title: Email Platform Migration
content: Seamless email migration to cloud platforms (Microsoft 365, Google Workspace) with minimal downtime.

title: Business Insights & Reporting
content: Custom analytics, KPI dashboards, predictive analytics, and comprehensive reporting for data-driven decisions.

title: SaaS Migration Services
content: Comprehensive SaaS migration including assessment, planning, execution, integration, and training.

title: Business Application Hosting
content: Secure, high-availability cloud hosting with automatic backups, disaster recovery, and 99.9% uptime SLA.

title: Custom Website Design
content: Fully customized, mobile-responsive websites. Choose from brochure sites, templated designs, or completely custom builds.

title: E-Commerce Development
content: Secure online stores with intuitive navigation, seamless checkout, payment integration, and premium shopping experience.

title: Website Refresh & Modernization
content: Modernize outdated websites with updated design, improved UX, mobile responsiveness, and SEO optimization.

title: Website Platform Migration
content: Migrate to WordPress, HubSpot CMS, or other platforms with zero downtime and SEO preservation.

title: Website Hosting & Maintenance
content: Packages (Lite, Essentials, Ultimate) with updates, security monitoring, performance optimization, and support.

title: Website Accessibility (ADA)
content: ADA/WCAG compliance with audits, remediation, and AI-driven tools. Reduce legal risk and expand audience reach.

title: Brand Identity Development
content: Strategy & positioning, logo design, visual identity, brand voice & messaging. Packages: Start, Spin-Off, Establish, Refresh.

title: Logo Design & Visual Identity
content: Memorable logos and cohesive visual identity systems with color palettes, typography, and design elements.

title: Brand Voice & Messaging
content: Distinctive brand voice, key messaging, taglines, and communication guidelines.

title: Marketing Collateral Design
content: Brochures, business cards, presentations, social media graphics, email templates, and packaging.

title: Content Strategy Development
content: Audience research, competitor analysis, content mission, editorial calendar, and distribution plan.

title: Website Content & SEO
content: SEO-optimized website content with content audits, keyword research, and persuasive copywriting.

title: E-Book Creation
content: Professional e-books with research, writing, design for lead generation and thought leadership.

title: Whitepaper Development
content: Data-backed whitepapers with industry research, data analysis, expert writing, and professional design.

title: Managed Marketing Packages
content: Packages (Lite, Essentials, Ultimate) with content generation, automation, inbound marketing, CRM management.

title: HubSpot Implementation
content: Complete HubSpot setup, customization, automation workflows, sales enablement, and training. Testimonial: 'Jamie Schwartz praised INT for amazing HubSpot support'

title: CRM Migration (Salesforce to HubSpot)
content: Expert CRM migration with zero data loss. Data mapping, execution, customization, integration. Testimonial: 'Selen Warner: seamless migration'

title: Marketing Automation & Drip Campaigns
content: Automated workflows including drip campaigns, lead nurturing, segmentation, trigger-based emails.

title: Inbound Marketing Administration
content: A/B testing, analytics reporting, social media posting, form/CTA creation, basic SEO, website analytics.

title: Bookkeeping & Accounting
content: Professional bookkeeping including expense management, financial reporting, tax prep support, financial strategy.

title: Startup Fundamentals

title: Process Management & Optimization
content: Streamline operations by removing inefficiencies, documenting processes, setting goals, improving scalability.

title: AI Your BI (AI-Powered Analytics)
content: Revolutionary AI solution analyzing company data for patterns, predictions, and actionable insights.

title: HRIS Implementation & Benefits Audit
content: HR system implementation, payroll integration, benefits audit, records alignment. Testimonials: 'Kami Hunt & Susan Pils praised efficiency'
